sentences.en: And in this example it's a large subsidy - 30 percent.
sentences.cn: 在这个例子中,补贴是非常高的:30%.

sentences.en: European farmers are planning a massive demonstration against farm subsidy cuts.
sentences.cn: 欧洲的农场主们正在策划一场反对削减农场补贴的大游行。

sentences.en: Food subsidy programs have other costs.
sentences.cn: 粮食补贴方案还要付出其他代价.

sentences.en: Higher deposit rates increase the budget costs of the subsidy program.
sentences.cn: 存款利润较高,就增大了补贴规划的预算费用.

sentences.en: LB subsidy includes all revenue and vehicle costs but excludes capital investment.
sentences.cn: LB津贴包括所有收入和车辆成本,但是排除资本投入.

sentences.en: Next, kind of subsidy harmfully in market fair principle.
sentences.cn: 其次, 这种补贴有害于市场公平原则.

sentences.en: So far, 3 350 households have bought homes with this subsidy.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止, 共有3350个家庭利用按揭还款补助金自置居所.

sentences.en: The cost of getting there is mitigated by Sydney's offer of a subsidy.
sentences.cn: 由于悉尼提供补助金，所以到那里的花费就减少了。

sentences.en: The cross - subsidy from paying patients is a major political irritant.
sentences.cn: 这种从付费病人给不能付费病人的跨越补助是今天的主要政治激点.

sentences.en: The living subsidy for senior expert's family is included in the remuneration.
sentences.cn: 报酬已包含高级专家家人的生活补贴.

sentences.en: The unIt'subsidy fell from 50 percent of cost to 17 percent.
sentences.cn: 单位补贴由占成本的50%下降为17%.

sentences.en: The university will receive a subsidy for research in artificial intelligence.
sentences.cn: 那个大学将得到一笔人工智能研究的补助费.

sentences.en: There were also pledges to soften the impact of the subsidy cuts on the poorer regions.
sentences.cn: 他们还承诺要减轻削减补贴给较贫困地区带来的影响。

sentences.en: They received a subsidy in the form of a percentage of all foreign trade operations.
sentences.cn: 他们通过外贸经营总额中提成的形式得到津贴.

sentences.en: to reduce the level of subsidy
You ask for an EU subsidy for your failed breeding programme.
sentences.cn: 你要欧盟补助你已经失败的繁殖计画.

words.tran_cn: 资助或补助（subsidize的过去时和过去分词）
资助；给与奖助金；向…行贿
[财政]补贴；[劳经]津贴；[会计][经]补助金

trans.tran_en: money that is paid by a government or organization to make prices lower, reduce the cost of producing goods etc
